attachments.title: Want to Get Into Tabletop RPGs? Here Are 6 Games to Get You Ready
attachments.text: Plenty of io9 readers are already obsessed with role-playing games; to you guys, we say take five. It’s the rest of you that we’re talking to, those who might be looking to get into the hobby but might be a bit daunted by the rules and the guidelines and the sheer number of games available. Don’t worry! We know exactly how you can safely (and enjoyably) enter the world RPGs.
attachments.fallback: io9: Want to Get Into Tabletop RPGs? Here Are 6 Games to Get You Ready
